nodes.text: The aunt of the Twi'lek farmer Jac Lodain was a female individual who fought against the Galactic Empire alongside Lodain's father. The former died, while the latter lost his arm. Lodain's parents later settled with him on the Outer Rim planet Batuu. During the smuggler Izal Garsea's visit to the planet around 34 ABY, Lodain told her of his family's history, including his aunt's death. The farmer wished to bravely fight for a cause like his aunt and father had, though Garsea encouraged him to protect his family instead.
Jac Lodain's aunt was first mentioned in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 young-adult novel written by Zoraida Córdova.
